original_solution_mapping.L1: Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=8>>8 cows.
original_solution_mapping.L2: This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 8 cows + 24 cows = <<8+24=32>>32 cows.
original_solution_mapping.L3: After he bought more cows he now has 32 cows + 43 cows = <<32+43=75>>75 cows.
original_solution_mapping.L4: After his friend gave him cows he now has 75 cows + 8 cows = <<75+8=83>>83 cows.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5156.
    Returns: the total number of cows the man has now.
    """
    # L1
    initial_cows = 39 # 39 cows
    died_cows = 25 # 25 of them died
    sold_cows = 6 # sold 6 of them
    cows_after_last_year = initial_cows - died_cows - sold_cows

    # L2
    increased_cows = 24 # increased by 24
    cows_after_increase = cows_after_last_year + increased_cows

    # L3
    bought_cows = 43 # bought 43 more
    cows_after_bought = cows_after_increase + bought_cows

    # L4
    gift_cows = 8 # gave him 8 cows as a gift
    final_cows = cows_after_bought + gift_cows

    # FA
    answer = final_cows
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Last year he had {initial_cows} cows - {died_cows} cows - {sold_cows} cows = <<{initial_cows}-{died_cows}-{sold_cows}={cows_after_last_year}>>{cows_after_last_year} cows.

This year after the number of the cows has increased he has {cows_after_last_year} cows + {increased_cows} cows = <<{cows_after_last_year}+{increased_cows}={cows_after_increase}>>{cows_after_increase} cows.
After he bought more cows he now has {cows_after_increase} cows + {bought_cows} cows = <<{cows_after_increase}+{bought_cows}={cows_after_bought}>>{cows_after_bought} cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has {cows_after_bought} cows + {gift_cows} cows = <<{cows_after_bought}+{gift_cows}={final_cows}>>{final_cows} cows.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Last year he had 39 cows - 6 cows - 6 cows = <<39-6-6=27>>27 cows.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 27 cows + 24 cows = <<27+24=51>>51 cows.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: After he bought more cows he now has 51 cows + 43 cows = <<51+43=94>>94 cows.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: After his friend gave him cows he now has 94 cows + 8 cows = <<94+8=102>>102 cows.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'sold_cows' (6) was used instead of 'died_cows' (25).
